original_text: Manoah said to the Lord's angel, ‘Please stay here with us. We would like to cook a young goat for you to eat.’
korean_text: 마노아가 여호와의 사자에게 말하되 구하옵나니 당신은 우리에게 머물러서 우리가 당신을 위하여 염소 새끼 하나를 준비하게 하소서 하니

sentences.original_text: Manoah said to the Lord's angel
We would like to cook a young goat
